Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 968 sq.ft. retail unit with excellent visibility on Bridge St W and Dansbury Dr. Join high profile tenants like Shell, Little Caesar's, Little Short Stop, Guardian Pharmacy and more. Currently being used as an office but potential for many other office or retail uses. Immediate.
